input0: Good Evening Ladies and Gentlemen, and welcome to Super Battles Assault!

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: For this fight, we've got a match between two Brutes from the Mushroom Kingdom!

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: In the red corner, we've got Bowser, the Demon King of the Koopas!

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: And in the blue corner, we have Donkey Kong, the 800-pound barrel-throwing ape!

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: The battle will take place on the rooftop of Bowser's Castle.

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: Both fighters have access to all their equipment, but get no outside help, and no preparation time.

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: Anyways, without further ado, let's see who will win this Super Battles Assault!

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: Okay, in my opinion, this battle could have honestly gone either way.

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: While Donkey Kong was stronger and faster, Bowser had better defense, allowing him to resist to DK's blows better.

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: Also, Bowser has a lot more experience than the Kong. This would allow Bowser to be able to deal with DK better, since this isn't the first time he's had a battle.

mutation.proccode: GarbageTV says %s for %n seconds at %n pps for %n lps

input0: Oh yeah, and by the way, they're both equally complete idiots. So yeah.
